this hotel was a complete disappointment. the room was dirty, the bed linens were stained, and there was a persistent musty odor. the "free" wifi barely worked, and the breakfast offered was barely edible.
this park is a nice place for a walk, with plenty of trees and a paved path. not as exciting as a major park, but good for a quick escape from the city.
